item.title: Codeforces Div2 Round 692
item.description: Introducction Solutions Problem A - In-Game Chat Problem Link This is a simple problem. Just count ‘)’ from right side and check the given condition. Code Codeforces Solution Problem B - Fair Numbers Problem Link So Number should be divided by all digits in it. whenevery anything need to be divided by each of number of a set, that thing must be divided by the LCM of the whole set.
